title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When attempting to perform a 'copy package' operation in project Ae, a strange behavior occurs.
OB: After creating a new project xxx and selecting a package in project Ae, the user chooses 'copy' from the context menu. At this point, some unexpected behavior is observed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'copy package' operation should create a copy of the selected package in the destination project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new project xxx
2. Select a package in project Ae
3. From the context menu, choose 'copy'
